text: The following lists events that happened in 1977 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *President - Kristján Eldjárn *Prime Minister - Geir Hallgrímsson ==Events== ==Births== Heiðar Helguson *25 March - Andri Sigþórsson, footballer. *16 May - Emilíana Torrini, singer and songwriter *10 June - Hugi Gudmundsson, composer *20 August - Ívar Ingimarsson, footballer *22 August - Heiðar Helguson, footballer *5 October - Hugleikur Dagsson, artist ===Full date missing=== *Hössi Ólafsson, musician ==Deaths== ==References== Category:1970s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1977 in Iceland
